game.name: Horse Riding Simulator
game.description:
Horse riding is a great fun for many boys. This brand new action-packed challenge is surely for you if you love watching horses in front of your eyes. Select one of the cool horses and get ready to join the biggest horse riding challenge of your life. It will definitely be an amazing experience to ride the horse on the landscape. Begin your game by selecting between the dry hills or green plains. You have to play the role of a cowboy in Horse Riding Simulator. 
This horse riding is not going to be easy at all as you have to ride a horse while fighting against a horde of zombies, who are everywhere and have come up directly from their graves anytime without giving you any prior warning. Jump over the uninvited obstacles, and try to walk in the water or sprint like a pro horse rider. Remember it is always difficult to be a local sheriff who has decided to eliminate all the dangerous residents from your city in this 3D HTML5 fighting game. 
Get ready to apply your sharp shooting skills to clear all bad guys while having a ride on your trustworthy horse. This zombie game features cool unique animations and five different horses to ride. There are 3 weapons like gun, sword and bow to use, and 2 big areas to play online for free. Kill each and every zombie before they come close to you and start attacking on you. Complete all missions and become the most popular and brave cowboy looking hero of your city. Check out more horse riding games for boys, where no downloads required to have fun.
